name: Augustine Yap
text: Scratch that, Ortigas is the worst. Out in the middle of nowhere, accessible only via dusty, smoky EDSA, and only 2-3 people can get on at any door during peak hours. At least from Ayala and Cubao, the previous stations are sort of empty. At Ortigas, all the cars are already full from Ayala and Cubao.
